name: Personal Dashboard - Notion Template (2022 ver.)

features: After purchase, you will receive an email to view the product's content. If you're logged into Gumroad, you can find the contents in your Gumroad Library (https://app.gumroad.com/library).; (Optional) If you don't have a Notion account, sign uphere.; Click on the Notion template link in the product.
